TopicTitle: Challenge: Make a VTOL SSTO, Capable of water landings AND flying to the Mun.

Articles.Content:
The Challenge:

Create a VTOL SSTO, Which can land on water then fly it to the Mun. Bonus points for Smaller size and Less engines.

Tried on Kerbal TV Livestream

Post a picture of the craft you made, On the Mun and landed in the ocean.

Leaderboard:

1)

2)

3)

Will /YOU/ Accept the challenge?

A VTOL SSTO is hard enough on its own.

Ill try it!.

I accidentally designed an SSTO last night. I was designing a refueling ship for my Duna Kethane mining operation and noticed that its Delta-v was enough to achieve Kerbin orbit. I think with some tweaks and the right flight plan I might just be able to pull this off.
